welcome: Hi, I’m developer and UX designer based in Sydney.
I’ve been building professional mobile, web and desktop apps since 2001, using cutting edge frontend technology creatively.

about.title: BACKGROUND
bio: I’ve been creating applications across various platforms since I finished my Programming and Multimedia studies in 2001. I speak and write fluidly in JavaScript, TypeScript, ActionScript, PHP, English and Spanish.
Currently, I’m primarily working with Javascript using React, Angular, SASS, Gulp, EaselJS and Webpack among others.

Throughout my career I’ve developed abilities and experience in a variety of disciplines within both programming and design, resulting in a global understanding of the creation of digital products. I communicate well with product managers, designers, programmers and clients to make sure all stakeholders are on the same page in every aspect of the project.

My work has mostly been focused on Frontend development, but with my interest halfway between code and creativity: I’m proficient with design, illustration, animation and sound editing tools, creating a big advantage when working and communicating with designers.
I create organized and scalable clean code. I use REST APIs. I program with design patterns in mind. I enjoy my work. And I commit to each project I participate in.

contact.title: CONTACT
